translations.chinese: 獨羽怨秦破項 梁，奮勢，願與沛公西入關。
translations.english: Only Xiang Yu resented Qin for defeating Xiang Liang and was eager to go west into the pass with Pei Gong.

translations.chinese: 懷王諸老將皆曰：「項羽為人慓悍禍賊，嘗攻襄城，襄城無唣類，所過無不殘滅。
translations.english: King Huai's veteran generals all said: "Xiang Yu is fierce and violent, a man of disaster. He once attacked Xiangcheng, leaving no survivors in Xiangcheng. Wherever he passes, nothing is left undestroyed.

translations.chinese: 且楚數進取，前陳王、項梁皆敗，不如更遣長者扶義 而西，告諭秦父兄。
translations.english: Moreover, Chu has repeatedly advanced but the former King Chen and Xiang Liang both failed. It would be better to send an elder who upholds righteousness to go west and inform the fathers and brothers of Qin.

translations.chinese: 秦父兄苦其主久矣，今誠得長者往，毋侵暴，宜可下。
translations.english: The fathers and brothers of Qin have suffered under their ruler for a long time. Now if we truly send an elder, without invasion or violence, the region should submit.

translations.chinese: 項羽不可遣，獨沛公素寬大長者。」
translations.english: Xiang Yu should not be sent. Only Pei Gong is habitually magnanimous and an elder."
